name: PeopleSoft: Avoid modification on lenghts or types on Field
description: FIELDTYPE and LENGTH are compared with those defined in the Vanilla
output: Failed checks gives the number of wrongly defined fields. The defined values in the vanilla and in the project can be found in the value column
rationale: Modification on length or type on Field will impact each record and the display on each page that contains it. You have to do an impact analysis on the entire environment (PeopleCode, SQR, Crystal, ...).
remediation: Avoid as much as possible modification on Field and document them.
